{/* Hero Section */}

GUNAM VARDHAN

Senior Data Engineer

From the vibrant town of Ranchi in Jharkhand, India, to the cutting-edge tech hubs of Toronto, I’ve embraced a journey fueled by curiosity and innovation. A Master’s graduate in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Concordia University, I’ve combined my passion for AI and machine learning with 5+ years of hands-on experience in Azure cloud solutions and MLOps.

Beyond the code, I’m a creative soul who finds joy in drawing, dancing salsa and bachata, and exploring the world through music, audiobooks, and travel. Eager to learn and adapt, I’m driven by the fast-paced evolution of technology and a commitment to delivering impactful solutions in an ever-changing digital landscape.
